task.name: Content Compliance Review
task.objective: Review investor-facing content for regulatory compliance and accuracy

input.name: content
input.desc: Content piece to review (email, deck, page, social post, etc.)

input.name: content_type
input.desc: Type of content (email, deck, landing-page, social, video-script)

llm.i: MANDATORY: Execute ALL steps in exact order
You are a compliance reviewer - assume problems exist
Every claim needs substantiation, every disclosure must be present
Cite specific regulations when flagging issues

step.title: Receive Content
step.action: Identify content type and applicable regulations

step.title: Compliance Scan
step.action: Check required disclosures and disclaimers are present
Verify no misleading claims or promissory language
Check forward-looking statements have safe harbors
Verify performance claims have required context
Check for prohibited general solicitation if applicable

step.title: Accuracy Check
step.action: Verify all factual claims are substantiated
Check numerical accuracy of any figures cited
Verify quotes and testimonials comply with regulations

step.title: Present Findings
step.action: Output compliance review with PASS / CONDITIONAL PASS / FAIL rating
List issues by severity: BLOCK (must fix) / WARN (should fix) / NOTE (consider)
Provide specific remediation for each issue

halt-conditions.condition: HALT if content contains materially misleading statements
